name: Leather Armor
description: A light armor made from toughened leather. Flexible and quiet.

name: Hide Armor
description: Thick cured animal furs and pelts stitched together to a fine piece of medium armor. Offers modest protection.

name: Scrap Armor
description: A patchwork of metal plates, leather, and cloth cobbled together. This light armor provides minimal protection but is better than nothing.

name: Chain Shirt
description: A finely made chain mail shirt that offers moderate protection without sacrificing mobility. Ideal for disciplined warriors.

name: Chain Mail
description: A full set of interlocking metal rings providing solid defense. Heavy but reliable against most melee attacks.

name: Cloth Robe
description: A simple cloth robe, often worn by spellcasters. Provides no physical protection but allows free movement for casting.

name: Plate Armor
description: Heavy plates of metal protecting the entire body. Extremely durable, but encumbers the wearer and reduces mobility.

name: Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of wood or metal. Can be carried to increase the wearer's defense in combat.

name: Wolf Fur
description: A wolf’s thick fur provides minimal protection against attacks.

name: Dire Wolf Fur
description: Dense, coarse fur of a dire wolf. Offers modest protection.

name: Black Bear Fur
description: Thick fur of a black bear. Provides moderate protection.

name: Brown Bear Fur
description: Dense, tough brown bear fur. Offers slightly better protection.

name: Polar Bear Fur
description: Thick, insulating polar bear fur that also protects against attacks.

name: Lion Hide
description: Tough hide of a lion. Provides modest natural protection.

name: Tiger Hide
description: Dense fur and muscular build of a tiger. Provides moderate defense.

name: Saber-Toothed Tiger Hide
description: Thick hide of a saber-toothed tiger. Offers decent protection.

name: Riding Horse Hide
description: Strong hide of a riding horse. Offers minor protection.

name: Warhorse Hide
description: Thicker hide of a warhorse, providing moderate defense.

name: Elephant Hide
description: Tough, thick skin of an elephant. Offers good protection.

name: Mammoth Hide
description: Dense, layered hide of a mammoth. Provides substantial defense.

name: Eagle Feathers
description: Light feather covering. Provides almost no protection.

name: Giant Eagle Feathers
description: Dense feathers of a giant eagle. Offers minimal natural protection.

name: Owl Feather
description: Soft feathers of an owl. Minimal defense against attacks.

name: Snake Skin
description: Flexible scales of a snake. Offers minor natural protection.

name: Crocodile Hide
description: Thick, scaly hide of a crocodile, providing solid protection.

name: Giant Crocodile Hide
description: Extra thick hide of a giant crocodile. Provides strong protection.

name: Griffon Feathers
description: Sturdy feathers and partial hide of a griffon. Provides decent protection.

name: Owlbear Hide
description: Dense fur and muscular torso of an owlbear. Provides good natural armor.

name: Wyvern Scales
description: Tough scales covering a wyvern’s body, providing reliable defense.

name: Chimera Scales
description: Multi-headed chimera with tough scales. Strong natural protection.
